name: Confluent Kafka Source
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic in Confluent Cloud and publish it to a topic in Quix

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: This is the Quix Topic that will receive the stream

Variables.Name: kafka_key
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal

Variables.Name: kafka_secret
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal

Variables.Name: kafka_broker_address
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal

Variables.Name: kafka_sasl_mechanism
Variables.Description: Obtained from the Confluent Kafka portal. Can be PLAIN, SCRAM-SHA-256, SCRAM-SHA-512, GSSAPI, OAUTHBEARER or AWS_MSK_IAM.

Variables.Name: kafka_topic
Variables.Description: The Confluent Kafka Topic you wish to read from
